WorkItem.Description:
Please assign an x:Key to the ListViewItem Style.

I have a custom ListViewItem but it uses the default style and not the Style which is defined for the ListViewItem. An x:Key attribute for the ListViewItem Style makes it easy to assign the m:ui ListViewItem Style to custom ListViewItem implementations.

```
public class CustomListItem : ListViewItem
{
     //Code
}
```

it could look like this:
```
<Style x:Key={ListViewItemKey} TargetType="{x:Type ListViewItem}">
```
